frontmatter.title: Thanksgiving: An Attitude of Gratitude
frontmatter.short: This is a holiday about gratitude, about family and about possibility. It brings people together to celebrate the harvest, to look each other in the eye and share something magical.
frontmatter.keywords: data driven storytelling, data driven culture
